meta.job_title: Manager for the Customer Success Renewal Quoting Team

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage the Customer Success Renewal Quoting Team to ensure on-time renewals and compliance with company policies.
Provide training and guidance to the team to support quote creation, revision, and process improvements.
Establish relationships with team leads of adjacent functions, define roles and responsibilities, and streamline processes.
Drive effectiveness and efficiency by identifying and implementing improvements to the quoting processes and tools.
Ensure achievement of on-time, accurate, and actionable renewal quote creation, revisions, and other key metrics.
Ensure renewal pricing follows current policies, rules, and procedures based on configuration of the offering and instance.
Manage special projects related to the renewal quoting process and function.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree, or 5+ years' experience in an Operations, Product, or Specialists role within a B2B organization
